text: Ron-Thorben Hoffmann (born 4 April 1999) is a German footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Bayern Munich. ==Club career== Hoffmann made his 3. Liga debut for Bayern Munich II on 30 July 2019, starting in the away match against Hansa Rostock. ==International career== Hoffmann made two appearances for the German under-18 national team in 2016, debuting at half-time in a friendly match against the Republic of Ireland on 13 November 2016. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" Style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club!!rowspan="2"|Season!!colspan="3"|League!!colspan="2"|Cup!!colspan="2"|Other!!colspan="2"|Total!!rowspan="2"| |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Bayern Munich||2017–18||Bundesliga |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 | |- |2018–19||Bundesliga |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 | |- |2019–20||Bundesliga |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 | |- !colspan="2"|Totals!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!— |- |rowspan="3"|Bayern Munich II||2018–19||Regionalliga Bayern |13||0||colspan="2"|—||2Appearances in the Regionalliga promotion playoff.||0||15||0 | |- |2019–20||3.
